text: Justice Gibson may refer to: *Ernest W. Gibson III, Associate Justice of the Vermont Supreme Court *Fred L. Gibson, Associate Justice of the Montana Supreme Court *James Gibson (judge), Presiding Justice of the New York Supreme Court (4th District), and a judge of the New York Court of Appeals *John Bannister Gibson, Chief Justice of the Pennsylvania Supreme Court *Phil S. Gibson, Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of California *Rankin Gibson, Associate Justice of the Ohio Supreme Court Category:Title and name disambiguation pages
title: Justice Gibson
